1.title: The Year of Shaking Dangerously
1.plot: It's well into the new year, and the Mausoleum gang decides it's time to take down their Christmas decorations. After Chantilly, Mr. Wormser and others are hurt during the process, Chester defers to the rule "safety first". While nursing their wounds, the injured are treated to an instructional film, "Shake Hands With Danger".

2.title: Shakin' 2: Sinkhole Boogaloo
2.plot: As the perilous task of removing the Christmas decorations continues, Chester falls into a sinkhole that opens in the floor of the Mausoleum. Mr. Wormser enlists the aid of the mysterious Tiny Marvin to help get his buddy free - and we get to watch the rest of "Shake Hands With Danger" in the process!

3.title: Mausoleum History X
3.plot: Little or nothing is known about Percival Snipe, the man who portrays Chester Grim on the hit show "Chester Grim's Mausoleum". Until now. Exclusive interviews and behind the scenes footage provide an intimate look into the life of the "man behind the skeleton hand gloves". Get your DVR, VCR, and/or PCP ready! The truth will finally be told!

4.title: Chester's Hallowe'en Treat
4.plot: Chester and the gang ramp up for their first Halloween special in six years! Everything begins well, but the festivities quickly go downhill after a mysterious spectral vapor begins filling the Mausoleum with bloodthirsty creatures! Any similarity to "The Fog" or "The Mist" may or may not be coincidental.

5.title: Christmas?!? Damn Near Killed Us!
5.plot: Join Chester Grim and friends as they celebrate the holidays with music, mirth, and Nanny McArdle's homemade pie! Oh, yeah - they also watch K. Gordon Murray's unbearable short film "Santa Claus and His Helpers" and fortify the Mausoleum with the sacred Staff of Ratott! It's more fun and excitement than the average human being deserves! Especially you!

6.title: The Holiday Addendum
6.plot: With Chester inadvertently transformed into a dessicated zombie, the Krampus is ready to reign over our Mausoleum pals! Can anyone save them, and put an end to what could possibly be their worst Christmas ever?

7.title: Friend Request
7.plot: In the series finale, the gang is forced to throw together a new episode even though they are unprepared. Things are made easier when an online associate supplies them with a short film they can use. Amidst a flurry of drug-fueled one-liners by Mr. Wormser, the guys settle back and watch "Curse of Mormo".

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: KZTX-TV's resident horror host Chester Grim goes online for the very first time, screening Patrick Rea's short film "Emergency Preparedness". Join Chester along with his Mausoleum sidekicks Mr. Wormser and Omar the hunchback for an evening of terrifying fun and frivolity!

2.title: Chester Grim's Mausoleum Halloween Special
2.plot: It's "All Hallow's Eve" at the mausoleum! Chester and the gang are ready to watch the Italian horror classic "The 13 Eyes Of Death's Kiss" when an unexpected zombie apocalypse befalls them! In an effort to protect themselves and their viewers, they gear up and show Lone Bannana Productions' "What To Do In A Zombie Attack" instead.

1.title: Chester Grim's Mausoleum Holiday Wonderland Part One
1.plot: Chester and his band of merry miscreants get ready to celebrate the holidays! Tinsel and bright lights decorate the mausoleum as we are treated to three "classic" short films - "Joan Avoids A Cold", "Dick & Ann Visit Santy Claus", and "Santa Claus' Punch & Judy". Chester even befriends a new visitor to his home - Nibsy, the Christmas Mouse!

2.title: Chester Grim's Mausoleum Holiday Wonderland Part Two
2.plot: Chester Grim's disaster-filled holiday show has led to his termination from KZTX-TV. It's up to a pair of Christmas carolers to help save the day - with an assist from Legion, a horrific amalgamation of at least three holiday seasons. It's mirth, magic, and blood sacrifice! Will Chester get his show back on the air?

1.title: Another Mausoleum Christmas
1.plot: Chester Grim and friends return and encourage you to "Dig Up A Corpse This Christmas"! The D.A. of Decay takes his show on the road while Mr. Wormser and Nibsy look on from the studio. When Chester is kidnapped by a deranged cannibal, who can save the holiday?

1.title: A Death in the Family
1.plot: After an almost three year absence, Chester Grim and friends return for more horrific fun! The Mausoleum has been given a facelift - and Chester is eager to show off the new set to his pals! But something is amiss! It's tragedy, suspense, and macabre humor - not to mention the classic short "This Is Hormel"! Chester is back, and more feverish than ever!

2.title: They Saved Wormser's Brain
2.plot: Chester enlists the aid of Nibsy the Mouse in an effort to bring Mr. Wormser back from the (second) dead. The only question is, will it work? Join the whole Mausoleum gang and find out! Also featuring the second half of the classic short "This Is Hormel"!

3.title: Arise, Wormser, Arise
3.plot: Chester's friend Mr. Wormser has been resurrected - as a disembodied head at the bottom of a fish tank. Chester takes to reading the "good book" in an effort to find a way to help make his pal whole again - and watches a short film entitled "The Door To Heaven".

4.title: Minding Our P's and Q's
4.plot: It's Omar's anniversary at the Mausoleum, Mr. Wormser is adjusting to his new body, and Chester is in trouble again with station management for offending a portion of the audience. In an effort to play it safe, the gang decides to air an educational film entitled "As Boys Grow". Hilarity ensues!

5.title: Chester's Civic Duty
5.plot: In the final episode of Series 4, Chester is absent from the show after being called up for jury duty. Mr. Wormser does his best to host with Chester doing live call-ins from the county courthouse. They also watch "Devil Comes Down" by Mutantville Productions! It's more fun than a barrel of dead monkeys!

imdb.plot outline: KZTX-TV's resident horror host Chester Grim goes online for the very first time, screening Patrick Rea's short film "Emergency Preparedness". Join Chester along with his Mausoleum sidekicks Mr. Wormser and Omar the hunchback for an evening of terrifying fun and frivolity!
imdb.title: Chester Grim's Mausoleum
plot: KZTX-TV's resident horror host Chester Grim goes online for the very first time, screening Patrick Rea's short film "Emergency Preparedness". Join Chester along with his Mausoleum sidekicks Mr. Wormser and Omar the hunchback for an evening of terrifying fun and frivolity!::Stu Smalls
